channel.title: pta on Notes repository
channel.description: Recent content in pta on Notes repository

item.title: Comparing portfolio returns with benchmark
item.description: Introduction In this post I go over an example of computing a portfolio return (TWR) and comparing it each month with a benchmark.

item.title: Computing returns with plain text account tools
item.description: Introduction In this post, I go over an example of how to compute returns using a plain text accounting (PTA) tool hledger.
